duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service and support to clients in a professional manner.
Handle inbound and outbound calls, resolving issues and answering inquiries.
Navigate multiple platform programs while engaging in phone conversations with clients.
Maintain a quiet work environment free from background noise during working hours.
Effectively communicate in written and verbal English, using proper grammar.
Manage time efficiently and multitask effectively in a fast-paced environment.
